nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, Jedi Master Even Piell was captured by Separatists but soon rescued by an elite team of Jedi and clones with the help of reprogrammed battle droids including OOM-10. When OOM-10, as well as the other two battle droids, tried escorting the what appeared to be a captured team to shuttle 81572 in order to escape, they were confronted by a B1-Series battle droid who asked where where the prisoners going. to which OOM-10 replied that they were being shifted to Point Tarron. But because there was no outpost on Point Tarron, the droid questioned OOM-10's statement.
The wording of the episode guide for Counterattack treats it that Point Tarron did not exist at all because the guide says Point Tarron was the made up outpost.
